attributes.action: Free Bus Travel for the British Unemployed on JSA
attributes.additional_details:
Every British Citizen (not migrant workers) who is in receipt of Job Seekers' Allowance (JSA) should be entitled to short-term free bus travel in the United Kingdom, as are Senior Citizens aged 60 years and over.

Most people aged 60 years and over are in receipt of free bus travel, and most but not all, are in a better position to pay the FULL bus fare than people such as myself on receipt of just about £65 per week in JSA.
